name: Dirt Pudding Cups
instructions: 1. In a small bowl, combine the chocolate pudding mix and milk. Whisk until well blended.
2. Divide the crushed chocolate sandwich cookies evenly between 2 serving cups.
3. Pour the prepared chocolate pudding over the crushed cookies, dividing it equally between the cups.
4. Place a gummy worm on top of each pudding cup.
5. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour to allow the pudding to set.
description: Dirt Pudding Cups are a fun and indulgent dessert, featuring layers of creamy chocolate pudding and crushed cookies, topped with a gummy worm. They are reminiscent of an edible mini garden, perfect for kids and those young at heart.
